website_summaries.verdict: Solid build and heavy hammer replacement handle that will work well with bigger hammer heads.
pros: Large hammer handle at 17.5 inches and with 10 ounces of weight, so this model is made for big hammer heads
Ships with both metal and wood wedges so you can pick the best option for your needs
Wood material in the handle is of a high quality that should give you a nice level of performance over time
cons: Manufacturer doesn't specify the type of wood in use

customer_reviews.title: NOT 17.5" long and don't know what type of wood
customer_reviews.text: The handle actually measures 16.5” long. The label said is by Vaughan, but it didn’t said what type of wood is it. The wood is a lighter color than shown in picture and it looks like Maple wood; I HOPE it is really hickory wood. The wood looks to be good quality. It comes with a wood wedge and two metal wedges. I have an old CF1 Vaughan hammer head and this handle fits into that head although this handle said it fits CF2 hammer. My hammer head is 20 oz, after I attached this handle to my old hammer head, it weights almost 2 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: A.W.

customer_reviews.title: (quality) and has been working great for me
customer_reviews.text: guessing the wood is hickory? (quality) and has been working great for me. pretty simple really. worth the buy if your hammer is busted. (mine came with a nice dark section on the edge, kind of like a birth mark. I appreciate the unique look.
customer_reviews.author: Ashmaley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This hatchet handle is obviously backwards. Good wood, will make a good fire!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control.
customer_reviews.text: It's cut backwards and the grain is in the completely wrong direction. Not worth the time or hassle to return while on deployment.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Fits great no heart wood. Wood grain runs the wrong way.
customer_reviews.author: K fred

customer_reviews.title: axe handle
customer_reviews.text: product was exactly what I was expecting, and fit my axe head great.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Podruchny

customer_reviews.title: Perfec Fit
customer_reviews.text: Two framing hammers are just like new again. I'm glad I finally got around to this task, good quality material for sure.
customer_reviews.author: RWM50

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and is a great replacement handle for my favorite hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Levie

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality but the head end was cut reversed
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but the head end was cut reversed. I used it anyway rather than returning it.
customer_reviews.author: jim hearne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the fit great i took a little time and put a differant finish on it
customer_reviews.author: Steve Curtis
